meanings.definition: A person who provides commentary or opinions on a particular subject.
meanings.sent1: The commentators on the radio shared their thoughts about the game.
meanings.sent2: The TV commentators discussed the latest political developments.
meanings.sent3: The commentators at the zoo had a lot to say about the new exhibit.
meanings.sent4: Her friends were like commentators, always offering their views on everything.
meanings.sent5: The commentators at the sports event were so engaging, I couldn't stop listening.

meanings.sent1: Many commentators were present at the conference to provide diverse perspectives.
meanings.sent2: The group of commentators had varying opinions on the movie.
meanings.sent3: The commentators in the audience started a lively debate about the topic.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with voices, like a chorus of commentators.
meanings.sent5: The commentators in the room added depth to the discussion with their different viewpoints.
